start.text: Hey, I bet I can kill more than you.
I'll give you the first shot.
We shouldn't pick fights with the locals. Just let the locals pick fights with us.
We can always claim they went crazy and attacked us.
Don't worry, I'll do all the work.
This time, let's try not to die.
Where did these guys come from?
I will defer to your judgment on this.
Didn't expect these guys to show up.
Why don't we just take care of this issue?
Looks like we have to take 'em out.
Let's share things with them. Things like missiles.
We're only hostile to people who are openly hostile to us.
Alright, we got your back this time.
Hold on, hold on, we have problems.
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?

start_boss.text: This is, uh, not normally the kind of thing that we fight, but...
Let's be careful, that thing looks scary!
What in the heck am I looking at here?

out_of_missiles.text: Sure, let's just expend all of our missiles...
Good news! We're all out of missiles!

engaged.text: You're not very good at butchering people, are ya?
Don't worry, I'll take this one out.
I have an idea, hold on.
You give 'em a vicious tongue-lashing. That'll teach 'em.
Hold on, I have the perfect solution to this problem...
At least you won't go quietly. You'll probably go crying and screaming.
Here I am! Rock you like a hurricane!
You are ten pounds of ugly in a two pound sack.

need_help.text: I could use some help over here!
Stop it! Stop laughing and kill them!
You know what would be wonderful? If you stopped playing with these guys and helped me.

pursuing.text: Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
While we can see 'em, let's just finish 'em off.
Hey, I bet I can kill more than you.
I'll give you the first shot.

running.text: I'm sorry, I apologize, it's your problem now!
Yeah, uh, I think I'll just leave this one to you.

hull_90.text: The only thing that's hurt is my pride.
Normally I have to pay to get treated like this.
I'm fine, don't worry about me!

hull_50.text: O-okay, we're starting to take some hits...
I am at half hull. This is not good.

hull_30.text: I'm gonna need repairs after this, that's for sure!
We-we're reporting a lot of damage right now, but I'm sure we'll be fine!

overload.text: I didn't know that would happen!
I'm sorry! I'm not good with computers like you are!

death.text: I can't believe something like this would happen.
Everything's on fire! Everything is terrible!

victory.text: I think that was all the enemies, I'm sure there won't be any more...
Don't think about it. Let's just go.
We didn't even have the opportunity to slaughter everybody.
I guess as long as you're having fun...
All glory to you, Lord Death!
Well, there are a lot of corpses.
I'm sure that was the last we'll ever hear of them.
Yeah, that's down for the count.
Should we go back in time and try that again?
We're done here. We came, we saw, we shot a bunch of people...
Why do we have to kill everybody?

victory_boss.text: The reason I hang out with you is because you make life a little more interesting.
